name: Middle/Senior Data Analyst
description:
Easybrain is looking for a talented Data Analyst to join the team, who will monitor product metrics, find reasons for changes in them, as well as generate ideas for improving them.

Responsibilities:

  • Ability to handle large amounts of data;
  • Analysing and monitoring key product indicators;
  • Searching for growth points, organising and conducting product AB tests;
  • Analysis of the game balance;
  • Researching user behaviour and influence of other factors;
  • Maintaining analytical expertise in chosen areas of the company.

Requirements:

  • Mathematical background;
  • In-depth knowledge of statistics;
  • Data analysis experience using Python;
  • Knowledge of SQL;
  • Structural approach to analysis;
  • Russian language is a necessity;
  • English language - intermediate level or higher;
  • Ability to work in a team.

Will be a plus:

  • Knowledge of analytics systems for mobile applications;
  • Experience in calculating ROI, ARPU, LTV, forecasting and analysing a wide range of metrics, audience segmentation;
  • Knowledge of mobile product metrics;
  • Experience in managing people and projects.

Benefits:

Besides the engaging tasks, support from experienced colleagues, and the opportunity to realize your own ideas, challenge, and drive, we offer:

  • Work on the best products in the niche;
  • High income with performance bonuses;
  • Sports reimbursement;
  • English lessons;
  • Medical insurance;
  • A fancy office in the center of Minsk, with a terrace and great coffee, cookies, and fruit (remote work during COVID-19).
